title.rendered: STEDI SWITCH FASCIA PANEL TO SUIT TOYOTA 70 SERIES LANDCRUISER

content.rendered:
Switch upgrade fascia to suit the 70 Series Toyota Landcruiser. Registered Design 20196070

DETAILS

If you drive a 70 series Landcruiser, our all-new LC70 switch fascia needs to be on top of your accessory wish-list.

Our focus when designing and manufacturing this fascia was to achieve absolute Original Equipment levels of fit and finish.  Don’t confuse our offerings with other 3D printed items on the market, our fascia are injection moulded with our tooling and know-how to an exacting specification & material composition.

We commissioned our beautiful tactile square Toyota switches for the array of 8. The upper switches blank remain the Tall Type Toyota switches to transfer the factory Toyota switches into. Installation takes approximately 5 minutes (not including wiring) and creates spaces to hold enough switches for even the most advanced builds.

The panel holds our Square type switches, which are available in numerous prints (with UHF, USB and voltmeter variants coming soon) and with blank panels available for purchase.

STEDI Designed & Manufactured: This product is not endorsed by, directly affiliated with Toyota™. All product and company names are the registered trademarks of their original owners. The use of any trade name or trademark is for compatibility and reference purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder of their product brand.

STEDI Product Registered Design Number: 20196070

SPECIFICATIONS

Fits 70 series Landcruiser with plastic dash.

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

1 x 70 Series Landcruiser RHD Switch Panel Fasica

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SWITCH FASCIA PANEL TO SUIT TOYOTA 70 SERIES LANDCRUISER

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
